summary: This document is an Aircraft Security Agreement between N550GP, LLC and Bank of Hope, detailing the terms under which the lender secures a continuing security interest in the aircraft and related collateral. It outlines the responsibilities of the grantor regarding the maintenance, insurance, and operation of the aircraft, as well as the rights of the lender in case of default.

persons.name: Richard Munkvold
persons.context: Richard Munkvold is identified as the Manager of N550GP, LLC, the grantor in the Aircraft Security Agreement.

connections.description: N550GP, LLC is the borrower and Bank of Hope is the lender in the Aircraft Security Agreement.

events.title: Execution of Aircraft Security Agreement
events.description: N550GP, LLC executed an Aircraft Security Agreement with Bank of Hope, granting a security interest in the aircraft.

locations: 2151 E. Convention Center Way, Suite 222, Ontario, CA 91764
3200 Wilshire Blvd, 7th Floor, Los Angeles, CA 90010
keyFacts: The Aircraft Security Agreement was executed on May 11, 2021.
N550GP, LLC is the grantor and Bank of Hope is the lender.
The agreement secures a continuing security interest in the aircraft and related collateral.
Richard Munkvold is the Manager of N550GP, LLC.
The principal place of business for N550GP, LLC is located in Ontario, California.
